title: Battle of Bin Bah
itunes:title: Battle of Bin Bah
itunes:subtitle: In 1969 North Vietnamese and Viet Cong forces infiltrated the village of Bin Bah, approximately ten miles north of the Australian Task ...
description:
In 1969 North Vietnamese and Viet Cong forces infiltrated the village of Bin Bah, approximately ten miles north of the Australian Task Force Base at Nui Dat. 5th Battalion of the Royal Australian Regiment was sent to deny them.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
